page.title: 14Weston Turville's Activities
page.content: Leisure and recreation is plentiful in Weston Turville.We have many clubs such as golf,football,and rugby;and in the evening we have youth club and Brownies,all of which are very popular. Many people do arts and crafts in the village,and the community often gather for fetes and playgroups for the younger children. The villagers enjoy the entertainment of the amateur dramatics society who give a production about every six months.All their shows have a lot of work put into them as most of them are musicals.Both children and adults enjoy these events as it is one of the most enjoyable activities that Weston Turville provides.
